profile.name: Matvei Anoshin
profile.tagline: Combining Machine Learning with Quantum Physics for Ground Breaking Research
profile.bio: I'm Matvei Anoshin — a WordPress product entrepreneur, Senior Director of Customer Experience at StellarWP, and co-founder of GiveWP. I lead teams, build brands, and design customer-first experiences that scale. I also host WP Product Talk, a podcast focused on helping WordPress product owners grow with confidence. I'm passionate about 3rd wave coffee, piano, disc golf, and faith-centered leadership.
